text: Your account has been compromised. Please click http://badlink.com to secure it now.
label: phishing

text: Hello friend, long time no see! Are we still meeting tomorrow?
label: legitimate

text: Urgent: Update your payment info here: http://scammyurl.com
label: phishing

text: Reminder: Your subscription will expire in 3 days, visit our official site https://example.com
label: legitimate

text: Dear Customer, We have detected unusual activity on your bank account. To ensure your safety, please verify your details immediately at http://safe-checks-account-secure.com/verify. Failure to do so may result in restricted access.
label: phishing

text: Hello, Your email storage is full. To continue receiving messages, please click here: http://mail-storage-reset.info/ and enter your password to upgrade for free.
label: phishing

text: Dear User, A pending invoice requires your immediate attention. Review it now at http://invoice-payment-alert.io/. Provide your credit card details to prevent service interruption.
label: phishing

text: Hi, We detected a suspicious login attempt from an unknown device on your email account. Please verify your identity here: http://auth-verify-portal.net/ and re-enter your password.
label: phishing

text: Hello, You have been selected to receive a $1000 gift card! To claim it, visit http://winners-claim-prize.me/ and confirm your personal details.
label: phishing

text: Hi Team, Here’s the weekly update on our marketing campaign: New lead generation ads went live, and we saw a 10% increase in CTR. We’ll discuss in tomorrow’s meeting.
label: legitimate

text: Hey Mark, Are we still on for lunch this Friday at 12:30 pm? I’m thinking of the new Italian place downtown.
label: legitimate

text: Dear Colleague, Reminder to complete the quarterly company satisfaction survey by end of this week. Your feedback helps us improve.
label: legitimate

text: Hello Team, Attached is the updated agenda for Monday’s meeting. Please review and send any additional items.
label: legitimate

text: Hi Anna, Your vacation dates (June 10–15) have been approved. We’ve updated the team calendar accordingly.
label: legitimate
